mapper.insert: insert into t_cities(city_id, city_name, description, date_time, district_id, postal_code_id) values(#{cityId},#{cityName},#{description},now(),#{districtId},#{postalCodeId})
mapper.select: SELECT city_id, city_name, description, date_time, is_del, district_id, postal_code_id FROM t_cities WHERE city_id != 0 AND is_del = 1
SELECT city_id, city_name, description, date_time, is_del, district_id, postal_code_id FROM t_cities WHERE city_id = #{cityId} AND is_del = 1
